title: Automated Visualization of eBike System Data
shortOutcome: End-to-end solution for automated analysis of telemetry data.
fullDescription: End-to-end solution for automated analysis and visualization of MF4 telemetry data including database design, Flask API, and KPI dashboards. This project served as a proof of concept for industrial data visualization.

title: Partner Portal Platform
shortOutcome: Web-based platform for managing partners and data flows.
fullDescription: A comprehensive web-based platform for managing partners, products, roles, and data flows. Features include interactive dashboards, role-based access control, and real-time analytics.

title: Automated Reporting Tools
shortOutcome: Python-based automation for KPI evaluation and reporting.
fullDescription: Developed Python-based automation scripts for KPI evaluation, visualization, and weekly report generation. The tools output professional PDF and HTML reports, saving hours of manual work.
